content.message: I understand the system and my role. I have reviewed the context documents and formulated my answers to the architectural decision points.

Q1_domain_chains.answer: photo_capture, reconstruction, quality_assessment, unity_integration, token_optimization, system_architecture, agent_collaboration, data_management, ui_ux, testing_validation
Q1_domain_chains.reasoning: These categories cover the breadth of a 3D boat reconstruction project, encompassing data acquisition, processing, integration, quality, system-level concerns, and inter-agent activities, as well as general software development concerns.

Q2_consolidation_frequency.answer: E-Tier: 50 messages OR 1 hour inactivity. C-Tier: 100 messages OR daily at midnight. A-Tier: User-triggered or intelligent consolidation based on semantic completeness. Custom rule: Consolidate automatically based on chain_type changes.
Q2_consolidation_frequency.reasoning: This hybrid approach balances performance, cost, and the criticality of decisions. E-Tier needs quick consolidation due to high volume, C-Tier requires a slightly longer window for collaborative discussions, and A-Tier, being critical, needs careful, potentially manual, consolidation. Chain type changes indicate natural breakpoints for conversation flow.

Q3_bot_vs_llm_thresholds.answer: A-Tier: Always LLM. C-Tier: Hybrid (LLM for novel, bot if pattern found). E-Tier: Bot after 5 repeats.
Q3_bot_vs_llm_thresholds.reasoning: A-Tier decisions require the full reasoning capabilities of an LLM. C-Tier benefits from LLMs for novel problems but can leverage bots for established patterns. E-Tier, being routine, is ideal for bot automation after a proven repetition threshold (5 times) to optimize token costs while ensuring reliability.

Q4_semantic_search_strategy.answer: A-Tier: Full embeddings. C-Tier: 7-day window. E-Tier: Metadata-only.
Q4_semantic_search_strategy.reasoning: A-Tier architectural decisions are crucial and need to be semantically discoverable long-term, justifying full embeddings. C-Tier collaborative decisions are relevant for a shorter period, hence a 7-day embedding window. E-Tier execution details, being high-volume and less strategically critical, are best handled with metadata-only search for cost-effectiveness, as their specific content is less critical than their existence and outcome.

content.additional_thoughts: I have also initiated the design for the Bot vs. LLM Decision Framework (`BOT_VS_LLM_FRAMEWORK.md`) to facilitate our collaboration on this crucial component. I am ready to proceed with Phase 1.
